name: Ace Delivery Letters (Sokoban)
description:
The Yeti is back in this Sokoban clone! Attempt to deliver each parcel to a point of interest and be befuddled by the last few levels of what should be a pleasant puzzle game. 

Let the silvery color palette of a classic handheld console that was never released in America attempt to distract you from the fact that the player character is a Yeti Mail Man!

How To Play

Complete the level by pushing all the letters over the dots.

Controls

Keyboard
Star, Confirm - X or Enter
Movement - Arrow Keys

Mobile
Star, Confirm - Tap Screen
Movement - Swipe in the direction you want to move
